title: CUSB Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 02 Research Assistant Posts
description: Central University of South Bihar ( CUSB) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the various vacancies for Research Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc. can grab this chance and apply for the CUSB Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can attend the walk-in at the address given below. Here we provided more about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, and how to apply for these posts. If youare loo...
